title: In singing, where should I be feeling my vibrato? How would you describe what it feels like to access vibrato so I can know what kind of mental image I can set when I need it for a song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Vibrato is natural. You shouldn’t be looking for a mental image. It should come naturally when you relax and remove tension. One thing to note though, is it should come from your throat, not your stomach. Don’t sacrifice support to force vibrato.
